payload.content: LLMs significantly alter the constraints landscape of software development, making it an interesting time for programming languages and formal methods.

name: LLMs significantly alter the constraints landscape of software development, maki
content: LLMs significantly alter the constraints landscape of software development, making it an interesting time for programming languages and formal methods.

payload.content: LLMs are particularly effective at code translation, more so than de-novo generation, because the original codebase serves as a detailed prompt and a reference for concrete test generation.

name: LLMs are particularly effective at code translation, more so than de-novo genera
content: LLMs are particularly effective at code translation, more so than de-novo generation, because the original codebase serves as a detailed prompt and a reference for concrete test generation.
